32 template<typename T>
33 class DagNode: public Object, public std::enable_shared_from_this<DagNode<T>>
34 {
35 public:
36  //static_assert(
37  // std::is_base_of<DagNode<T>, T>::value,
38  // "T must be a descendant of DagNode<T>"
39  // );

41  typedef std::vector<std::shared_ptr<T>> NodeVector;
42 
46 
48  static void EraseFromNodeVec(uint32_t id) {
49  // Clear from static vector
50  s_nodes[id] = nullptr;
51 
52  s_erasedNodes.push_back(id);
53  }
54 
56  static std::vector<std::shared_ptr<T>>& DagNodes() { return s_nodes; }
57 
59  static void Clear() {
60  s_nodes.clear();
61  s_erasedNodes.clear();
62  }
63 
65 
69 
70  virtual ~DagNode() {
71  }
72 
74 
78 
80  void get3ChannelId(uint32_t* colorArray) {
81  Get3ChannelId(id(), colorArray);
82  }
83 
85  uint32_t id() const { return m_uniqueID; }
86 
87  bool hasChild(uint32_t id, uint32_t& outIndex) {
88  bool found = false;
89  uint32_t numChildren = (uint32_t)m_children.size();
90  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numChildren; i++) {
91  if (m_children[i]->id() == id) {
92  outIndex = i;
93  return true;
94  }
95  }
96  return found;
97  }
98 
100  void addParent(const std::shared_ptr<T>& parent) {
101  // Add parent to this node
102  addParentPrivate(parent);
103 
104  // Add this node as a child of the parent node
105  parent->addChildPrivate(sharedPtr());
106  }
107 
109  void addChild(const std::shared_ptr<T>& child) {
110  // Add child to this node
111  addChildPrivate(child);
112 
113  // Add this node as a parent of the child node
114  child->addParentPrivate(sharedPtr());
115  }
116 
118  void removeParent(uint32_t parentId) {
119  if (std::shared_ptr<T> parent = m_parents.at(parentId).lock()) {
120  parent->removeChildPrivate(m_uniqueID);
121  }
122  removeParentPrivate(parentId);
123  }
124 
126  void removeChild(DagNode* child)
127  {
128  child->removeParentPrivate(m_uniqueID);
129  removeChildPrivate(child->id());
130  }
131  void removeChild(const std::shared_ptr<DagNode>& child) {
132  child->removeParentPrivate(m_uniqueID);
133  removeChildPrivate(child->id());
134  }
135 
137  GString hierarchyDescription(int level = 0) {
138  GString margin = QStringLiteral("\t").repeated(level);
139  GString tabbed = margin + "\t";
140  GString description = margin + GString::FromNumber(m_uniqueID);
141 
142  for (const std::shared_ptr<DagNode>& child : m_children) {
143  if (child->hasChildren()) {
144  description += "\n" + child->hierarchyDescription(level + 1);
145  }
146  else {
147  description += "\n" + tabbed + GString::FromNumber(child->id());
148  }
149  }
150 
151  return description;
152  }
153 
155 
159 
160  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<T>>& children() { return m_children; }
161  const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<T>>& children() const { return m_children; }
162 
164  inline bool hasChildren() const { return numChildren() != 0; }
165 
167  inline bool hasParents() const { return numParents() != 0; }
168 
170  inline uint32_t numParents() const { return (uint32_t)m_parents.size(); }
171 
173  inline uint32_t numChildren() const { return (uint32_t)m_children.size(); }
174

177  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
181  const char* className() const override { return "DagNode"; }
182 
184  const char* namespaceName() const override { return "rev::DagNode"; }

187 protected:

194  friend class AddSceneObjectCommand;

197 
201 
202  DagNode(): Object() {
203  }
204 
207 
208  NodeVector parents() {
209 
210  // Generate vector of shared pointers to valid parents
211  auto parents = std::vector<std::shared_ptr<T>>();
212  parents.reserve(m_parents.size());
213  for (auto& parentPair : m_parents) {
214  if (std::shared_ptr<T> parent = parentPair.second.lock()) {
215  parents.push_back(parent);
216  }
217  }
218 
219  // Update map of parents if some are invalid
220  if (m_parents.size() != parents.size()) {
221  m_parents.clear();
222  for (const std::shared_ptr<T>& parent : parents) {
223  Map::Emplace(m_parents, parent->id(), parent);
224  }
225  }
226 
227  return parents;
228  }
229 
231  const std::shared_ptr<T>& sharedPtr() {
232  return s_nodes.at(m_uniqueID);
233  }
234 
236  void addToNodeMap() {
237  if (!s_erasedNodes.size()) {
238  m_uniqueID = (uint32_t)s_nodes.size();
239  s_nodes.push_back(std::static_pointer_cast<T>(shared_from_this()));
240  }
241  else {
242  m_uniqueID = s_erasedNodes.back();
243  s_erasedNodes.pop_back();
244  s_nodes[m_uniqueID] = std::static_pointer_cast<T>(shared_from_this());
245  }
246  }
247 
249  NodeVector m_children;
250 
252  tsl::robin_map<uint32_t, std::weak_ptr<T>> m_parents;
253 
254 private:
255 
256  virtual void onAddChild(const std::shared_ptr<T>& child) = 0;
257  virtual void onAddParent(const std::shared_ptr<T>& parent) = 0;
258  virtual void onRemoveChild(const std::shared_ptr<T>& child) = 0;
259  virtual void onRemoveParent(const std::shared_ptr<T>& parent) = 0;
260 
263  void addChildPrivate(const std::shared_ptr<T>& child) {
264  uint32_t childIndex;
265  if (hasChild(child->id(), childIndex)) {
266  logCritical("Error, node is already a child of the current node");
267  throw std::range_error("Error, node is already a child of the current node");
268  }
269  m_children.push_back(child);
270 
271  onAddChild(child);
272  }
273 
276  void addParentPrivate(const std::shared_ptr<T>& parent) {
277  if (m_parents.find(parent->id()) != m_parents.end()) {
278  logCritical("Error, node is already a parent of the current node");
279  throw std::range_error("Error, node is already a parent of the current node");
280  }
281  Map::Emplace(m_parents, parent->id(), parent);
282 
283  onAddParent(parent);
284  }
285 
288  void removeChildPrivate(uint32_t childID) {
289  uint32_t childIndex;
290  if (!hasChild(childID, childIndex)) {
291  throw std::range_error("Error, no child with the given ID was found for removal");
292  }
293  onRemoveChild(m_children[childIndex]);
294  m_children.erase(m_children.begin() + childIndex);
295  }
296 
299  void removeParentPrivate(uint32_t parentID) {
300  if (!Map::HasKey(m_parents, parentID)) {
301  throw std::range_error("Error, no parent with the given ID was found for removal");
302  }
303  std::shared_ptr<T> parent = m_parents[parentID].lock();
304  onRemoveParent(parent);
305  m_parents.erase(parentID);
306  }
307 
309  static std::vector<std::shared_ptr<T>> s_nodes;
310  static std::vector<uint32_t> s_erasedNodes;
311 
313  uint32_t m_uniqueID;
314 
315 };
316

320 template<typename T>
321 std::vector<uint32_t> DagNode<T>::s_erasedNodes = {};
